data.name: CreateAllProcedures
data.value: CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteScalarWithReturnValueAsInt] AS BEGIN RETURN 42 END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteScalarWithSelectAsInt] AS BEGIN SELECT 42 END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteScalarWithSelectAsVarChar] AS BEGIN SELECT 'The answer is 42' END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteScalarWithSelectAsDateTime] AS BEGIN SELECT CONVERT(DATETIME, '2012-01-01') END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteScalarWithSelectAsBooleanTrue] AS BEGIN SELECT CONVERT(BIT, 1) END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteScalarWithSelectAsBooleanFalse] AS BEGIN SELECT CONVERT(BIT, 0) END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteScalarWithSelectMultipleColumnsAsInt] AS BEGIN SELECT 42, 43, 44 END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteScalarWithSelectMultipleColumnsAsVarChar] AS BEGIN SELECT 'The answer is 42', 'No, is 43', 'Is 44 for sure' END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteReaderWithMultipleLinesExactProperties] AS BEGIN SELECT 'John Doe' as Name, CONVERT(DATETIME, '1990-01-01') AS BirthDate, 98.7 AS Weight, CONVERT(BIT, '1') AS IsMale, 210 AS IQ UNION SELECT 'Mario Bros' as Name, CONVERT(DATETIME, '1990-02-02') AS BirthDate, 94.7 AS Weight, CONVERT(BIT, '1') AS IsMale, 220 AS IQ END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteReaderWithMultipleLinesMoreProperties] AS BEGIN SELECT 'John Doe' as Name, CONVERT(DATETIME, '1990-01-01') AS BirthDate, 98.7 AS Weight, CONVERT(BIT, '1') AS IsMale, 210 AS IQ, 23 as Age UNION SELECT 'Mario Bros' as Name, CONVERT(DATETIME, '1990-02-02') AS BirthDate, 94.7 AS Weight, CONVERT(BIT, '1') AS IsMale, 220 AS IQ, 25 as Age END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteReaderWithMultipleLinesLessProperties] AS BEGIN SELECT 'John Doe' as Name, CONVERT(DATETIME, '1990-01-01') AS BirthDate UNION SELECT 'Mario Bros' as Name, CONVERT(DATETIME, '1990-02-02') AS BirthDate END GO CREATE PROCEDURE [ExecuteReaderWithNoLinesExactProperties] AS BEGIN SELECT 'John Doe' as Name, CONVERT(DATETIME, '1990-01-01') AS BirthDate, 98.7 AS Weight, CONVERT(BIT, '1') AS IsMale, 210 AS IQ WHERE 1 = 0 END

data.name: CreateDataBase
data.value: CREATE DATABASE [NeatProcedureDBTest] ON PRIMARY ( NAME = N'NeatProcedureDBTest', FILENAME = N'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL10.SQLEXPRESS\MSSQL\DATA\NeatProcedureDBTest.mdf', MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 1024KB ) LOG ON ( NAME = N'NeatProcedureDBTest_log', FILENAME = N'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQL10.SQLEXPRESS\MSSQL\DATA\NeatProcedureDBTest_log.ldf', MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 10%)

data.name: DropDataBase
data.value: ALTER DATABASE [NeatProcedureDBTest] SET SINGLE_USER WITH ROLLBACK IMMEDIATE DROP DATABASE [NeatProcedureDBTest]
